Text: Preference Pane:  Preference Panes are the OS X replacement to control panels. Prior to Mac OS X v10.4, collections of Preference Panes featured a "Show All" button to show all the panes in the collection and a customizable toolbar to which frequently-used preference panes could be dragged.

Text: Preference Pane:  In Mac OS X v10.3, the currently-active pane would also be highlighted in the toolbar when it was selected.
